name: DRAGONZ
description: $DRAGONZ is the native utility token of Dragonz Land, a competitive Play-to-Earn card game. The token powers key functions within the game ecosystem, including in-game purchases, seasonal tournament rewards, staking benefits, and governance participation. Players earn $DRAGONZ through performance-based gameplay and progression in the seasonal Trophy Road system. Staking $DRAGONZ unlocks tiered rewards such as exclusive cards, cosmetic enhancements, and passive bonuses. The token is deployed on both the TON and Venom networks, enabling scalable and cross-chain utility for the Dragonz Land economy.
